6256d43cb0590.Name: LLP012 List addresses to select from
6256d43cb0590.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display
	   ,uprn as name
  FROM (SELECT sao
  			  ,pao
  			  ,street_name
  			  ,town_name
  			  ,uprn
          FROM llpgcache 
         WHERE length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
           AND postcode != ''
           AND (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,' ',postcode) like concat('%',REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ','%'),'%'))) tmp
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

6256e25cdaee2.Name: LLP013 Selected value to fields inc text area address
6256e25cdaee2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT a.*
		,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='1',flat_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='2',house_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='3',street_out
																							   ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1
		,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='2',house_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='3',street_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2
		,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='3',street_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3
		,if(substring(a.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4
		,a.test as available
		,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ''),
				if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ''),
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ''),
				postcode_out5) as AddrConcat
		,concat(flat_out, if(length(flat_out) > 3, '\n', if(flat_out != '', ' ', '')), 
				house_out, if(length(house_out) > 3, '\n', if(house_out != '', ' ', '')), 
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,'\n'), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,'\n'), ''),
				postcode_out5) as AdTextArea_out
FROM (SELECT sao as flat_out,
			 pao as house_out,
			 street_name as street_out,
			 town_name as town_out, 
			 postcode as postcode_out5,
			 uprn as uprn_out,
			 lng as lng_out,
			 lat as lat_out,
			 {Choose_Address} as uprn_selected,
			 CONCAT(if(length(sao)>0,1,'')
					,if(length(pao)>0,2,'')
					,if(length(street_name)>0,3,'')
					,if(length(town_name)>0,4,'')) as test
	    FROM llpgcache
WHERE uprn = {Choose_Address}) a","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}

6262afe3906c5.Name: LLP029 Change to Use Customer Recorded
6262afe3906c5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"Select Comb.*
		,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='1',flat_out
			,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='2',house_out
				,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='3',street_out
					,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1
		,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='2',house_out
			,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='3',street_out
				,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2
		,if(substring(Comb.test,3,1)='3',street_out
			,if(substring(Comb.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3
		,if(substring(Comb.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4
		,Comb.test as available
From
(select
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	IF({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	CONCAT(if(length({flat})>0,1,'')
			,if(length({house})>0,2,'')
			,if(length({street})>0,3,'')
			,if(length({town})>0,4,'')) as test
	,concat(if({flat} != '', concat({flat},', '), ''),
			if({house} != '', concat({house},', '), ''),
			if({street} != '', concat({street},', '), ''),
			if({town} != '', concat({town},', '), ''),
			{postcode},
			if({country} != '', concat(', ', {country}), '')) as AddrConcat
	,concat({flat}, if(length({flat}) > 3, '\n', if({flat} != '', ' ', '')),
			{house}, if(length({house}) > 3, '\n', if({house} != '', ' ', '')),
			if({street} != '', concat({street},'\n'), ''),
			if({town} != '', concat({town},'\n'), ''),
			{postcode},
			if({country} != '', concat('\n', {country}), '')) as AdTextArea_out
	,'ProcAi' as haveRun
Union select
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	'' as test,
	'' as AddrConcat,
	'' as AdTextArea_out,
	'ProcAi' as haveRun) as Comb
Where
	IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') = Comb.existSelected","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

6256e9029d71c.Name: LLP023 Confirm the entered address inc text area address
6256e9029d71c.Output_template: {"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'Entered',' ') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,' ',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,' ' ,concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,'The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. ',' ') ,if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',' '))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from( select aq.* ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='1',flat_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='2',house_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='4',town_out,' ')))) as textOut1 ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='2',house_out ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='4',town_out,' '))) as textOut2 ,if(substring(aq.test,3,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,3,1)='4',town_out,' ')) as textOut3 ,if(substring(aq.test,4,1)='4',town_out,' ') as textOut4 ,aq.test as available ,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ' '), if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ' '), if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ' '), if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ' '), postcode_out5, zIPPostcode, if(country_out != '', concat(', ', country_out), ' ')) as AddrConcat ,concat(flat_out, if(length(flat_out) > 3, '\n', ' '), house_out, if(length(house_out) > 3, '\n', ' '), if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,'\n'), ' '), if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,'\n'), ' '), postcode_out5, zIPPostcode, if(country_out != '', concat('\n', country_out), ' ')) as AdTextArea_out ,concat(flat_out, if(length(flat_out) > 3, '\n', ' '), house_out, if(length(house_out) > 3, '\n', ' '), if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,'\n'), ' '), if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,'\n'), ' '), postcode_out5, zIPPostcode, if(country_out != '', concat('\n', country_out), ' ')) as AdTextArea_de1 from ( select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer, CONCAT(if(length({flat_out1})>0,1,'') ,if(length({house_out1})>0,2,'') ,if(length({street_out1})>0,3,'') ,if(length({town_out1})>0,4,'')) as test) aq ) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,0) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,0) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,0) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[UBub]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = props.label: html 33
props.content:
Privacy notice

Portsmouth City Council will process your personal information appropriately and legally in accordance with the relevant national legislation. The details you provide will be held in a secure system or database and will only be shared with other organisations where the law allows.

When you make an enquiry, we collect information, including your personal data, so that we can respond to it and fulfil our regulatory responsibilities. We use the information supplied to us to deal with the enquiry and any subsequent issues that may arise. We keep records of enquiries to check on the level of service we provide and to analyse demand to help us improve our online resources and information. These records are only processed in a way that does not identify anyone.

Portsmouth City Council uses an online form service supplied by Granicus.

Granicus does not use your personal information for anything other than providing the service to the Council and will not pass on your information for promotional purposes to any other person or organisation (third parties).

For more information about how Granicus uses personal information, view the Granicus govService Subscriber Privacy Policy

For more information about how Portsmouth City Council uses personal information, view the Council's Data Protection Privacy Notice

props.label: html 62
props.content:
Privacy notice

Portsmouth City Council will process your personal information appropriately and legally in accordance with the relevant national legislation. The details you provide will be held in a secure system or database and will only be shared with other organisations where the law allows.

When you make an enquiry, we collect information, including your personal data, so that we can respond to it and fulfil our regulatory responsibilities. We use the information supplied to us to deal with the enquiry and any subsequent issues that may arise. We keep records of enquiries to check on the level of service we provide and to analyse demand to help us improve our online resources and information. These records are only processed in a way that does not identify anyone.

Portsmouth City Council uses an online form service supplied by Granicus.

Granicus does not use your personal information for anything other than providing the service to the Council and will not pass on your information for promotional purposes to any other person or organisation (third parties).

For more information about how Granicus uses personal information, view the Granicus govService Subscriber Privacy Policy

For more information about how Portsmouth City Council uses personal information, view the Council's Data Protection Privacy Notice
